Defeat target asset that has no supply cards.

name: This Tribunal Is Over
effect: Defeat target mission.

name: Tightening the Noose
effect:
Resolve: 2 personnel.
Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Each time a player draws a card in the execution phase, he or she discards a card.

name: To the Victor
effect: Exhaust target personnel.

name: To Your Ships
effect:
Resolve: 1 Officer and 1 Pilot.
Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This personnel gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

name: Top Off the Tank
effect: Put this card beneath your base or an asset you control as a supply card. Don't put this card into your discard pile after its ability takes effect.

name: Treacherous Toaster
effect: Target Cylon threat gets +2 power. Draw a card.

name: Trust the Lords of Kobol
effect:
Resolve: 1 personnel.
Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this unit. The next time you would reveal a mystic value for a challenge this turn, don't. Target unit gets +X power instead, where X is this unit's mystic value.

name: Unexpected...
effect: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [P] excess resources, you can play this card.) Target Cylon ship loses the Cylon trait until the end of the turn.

name: Unwelcome Visitor
effect: Target challenging Cylon personnel gets +4 power. When the challenge ends, defeat the target.

name: Viral Warfare
effect:
Resolve: 2 Cylon units.
Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this ship: Target player discards a card.

name: Vulnerable Supplies
effect: Target opposing unit gets -X power, where X is the number of assets that have no supply cards that its controller controls.

name: William Adama, Husker
effect: Scramble (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

name: William Adama, Tactician
effect: Commit: Target other personnel gains Sniper. (Each time this unit challenges, you can choose the defender.)
